and Niger.  Debt re-profiling involves the 
restructuring of existing expensive short-term 
sovereign debt into cheaper debt with longer 
maturities. This eases the government’s near 
term debt service obligations allowing greater 
focus on initiatives that develop their respective 
economies, improving living standards on the 
ground.
